member.name: T:MySql.Improver.MySqlAsyncEvent
member.summary: It give access to the methods that allow to execute asynchronous queries to a MySql database.

member.summary: Open a new Connection with a MySql database.
member.param: Database name(Must be specified on Android)

member.name: M:MySql.Improver.MySqlAsyncEvent.CloseConnection
member.summary: Close the current Connection with the MySql server.

member.name: M:MySql.Improver.MySqlAsyncEvent.ExecuteReader(System.String,MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a query and return the data reader (Remember to close the reader first of execute a new query).

member.name: M:MySql.Improver.MySqlAsyncEvent.DescribeTable(System.String)
member.summary: Gives infos about the specified table (Remember to close the reader first of execute a new query).

member.name: M:MySql.Improver.MySqlAsyncEvent.ExecuteQuery(System.String,MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a query and return the number of records -1 if the query fail.

member.name: M:MySql.Improver.MySqlAsyncEvent.ExecuteScalar(System.String,MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a query and return the first object null if the query fail.

member.name: M:MySql.Improver.MySqlAsyncEvent.ExecuteFill(System.String,MySql.Data.MySqlClient.MySqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a query and return the data set.
